name: winner-pick
description: Because it only counts if you pick the winner. The goal of this app is to pick the winner of a series of a reality TV show. The MVP will be to have teams draft their players and for their player to be one of the winners for all the bragging rights.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
